properties.entry: SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_IMAGE, p.PRODUCT_NM, p.PRICE, c.BUYING_RATE FROM "MEMBER" m JOIN CART c ON(m.MEMBER_NO = c.MEMBER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT p ON(p.PRODUCT_NO = c.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE m.MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO "ORDER" (MEMBER_NO, ORDER_NO, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_PHONE, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, ORDER_DATE, REFUND_FL) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
SELECT PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_NM, PRICE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL (ORDER_DETAIL_NO, PRODUCT_NO, BUYING_RATE, PRICE, REQUEST, ORDER_NO) VALUES(ORDER_DETAIL_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT o.ORDER_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(o.ORDER_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY" / "MM" / "DD'), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(o.ORDER_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') + INTERVAL '3' DAY, 'DAY"," MM"월" DD"일""," YYYY'), od.BUYING_RATE, od.PRICE, p.PRODUCT_NM FROM "MEMBER" m JOIN "ORDER" o ON (o.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO) JOIN "ORDER_DETAIL" od ON (od.ORDER_NO = o.ORDER_NO) JOIN "PRODUCT" p ON (p.PRODUCT_NO = od.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE m.MEMBER_NO = ? AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDDHH24MI')) - TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(o.ORDER_NO, 1, 10)) < 5
